marketplaces.name: claude-playbooks
marketplaces.description: Production-grade prompt templates for smart contract audits, PR reviews, content creation, and Web3 operations. Turn messy inputs into consistent, reusable prompts.
marketplaces.repo_description: Reusable Claude prompt templates with variable substitution and lifecycle hooks

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "name": "claude-playbooks",
  "owner": {
    "name": "Francesco Andreoli",
    "email": "[email protected]"
  },
  "metadata": {
    "description": "Production-grade prompt templates for smart contract audits, PR reviews, content creation, and Web3 operations. Turn messy inputs into consistent, reusable prompts.",
    "version": "2.0.0",
    "pluginRoot": "./playbooks"
  },
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "audit-contract",
      "source": "./playbooks",
      "description": "Comprehensive smart contract security audit with severity ratings, risk assessment, and Go/No-Go recommendations",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "author": {
        "name": "Francesco Andreoli",
        "email": "[email protected]"
      },
      "homepage": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "repository": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "license": "MIT",
      "keywords": ["security", "audit", "smart-contracts", "web3", "solidity"],
      "category": "security",
      "tags": ["blockchain", "ethereum", "defi", "audit"],
      "agents": "./playbooks/audit_contract.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "review-pr",
      "source": "./playbooks",
      "description": "Pull request code review with risk categorization, test plan, and actionable improvement suggestions",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "author": {
        "name": "Francesco Andreoli",
        "email": "[email protected]"
      },
      "homepage": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "repository": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "license": "MIT",
      "keywords": ["code-review", "pr-review", "development", "quality"],
      "category": "productivity",
      "tags": ["code-quality", "review", "git"],
      "agents": "./playbooks/review_pr.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "release-notes",
      "source": "./playbooks",
      "description": "Generate structured changelog and release announcements from changes with upgrade notes and test checklist",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "author": {
        "name": "Francesco Andreoli",
        "email": "[email protected]"
      },
      "homepage": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "repository": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "license": "MIT",
      "keywords": ["release", "changelog", "documentation", "versioning"],
      "category": "productivity",
      "tags": ["releases", "changelog", "documentation"],
      "agents": "./playbooks/release_notes.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "ship-blog",
      "source": "./playbooks",
      "description": "Technical blog post generator with title options, outline, full draft, TLDR, and X/Twitter thread",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "author": {
        "name": "Francesco Andreoli",
        "email": "[email protected]"
      },
      "homepage": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "repository": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "license": "MIT",
      "keywords": ["content", "blog", "writing", "marketing"],
      "category": "productivity",
      "tags": ["content-creation", "blog", "writing", "social-media"],
      "agents": "./playbooks/ship_blog.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "token-launch-checklist",
      "source": "./playbooks",
      "description": "End-to-end Web3 token launch planning with timeline, checklists, and top 10 failure modes with mitigation",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "author": {
        "name": "Francesco Andreoli",
        "email": "[email protected]"
      },
      "homepage": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "repository": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "license": "MIT",
      "keywords": ["web3", "token", "launch", "defi", "planning"],
      "category": "productivity",
      "tags": ["web3", "token", "launch", "operations"],
      "agents": "./playbooks/token_launch_checklist.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "panel-questions-web3",
      "source": "./playbooks",
      "description": "Conference panel discussion question generator for Web3 events with audience-focused content",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "author": {
        "name": "Francesco Andreoli",
        "email": "[email protected]"
      },
      "homepage": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "repository": "https://github.com/andreolf/claude-playbooks",
      "license": "MIT",
      "keywords": ["web3", "conference", "panel", "questions", "events"],
      "category": "productivity",
      "tags": ["web3", "conference", "speaking", "events"],
      "agents": "./playbooks/panel_questions_web3.md"
    }
  ]
}

plugins.name: audit-contract
plugins.description: Comprehensive smart contract security audit with severity ratings, risk assessment, and Go/No-Go recommendations

plugins.name: review-pr
plugins.description: Pull request code review with risk categorization, test plan, and actionable improvement suggestions

plugins.name: release-notes
plugins.description: Generate structured changelog and release announcements from changes with upgrade notes and test checklist

plugins.name: ship-blog
plugins.description: Technical blog post generator with title options, outline, full draft, TLDR, and X/Twitter thread

plugins.name: token-launch-checklist
plugins.description: End-to-end Web3 token launch planning with timeline, checklists, and top 10 failure modes with mitigation

plugins.name: panel-questions-web3
plugins.description: Conference panel discussion question generator for Web3 events with audience-focused content
